mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stereoscopic viewer and stereoview cards
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: wood (plant material); leather; paper (fiber product); glass (material) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cards are held by metal prongs attached to the viewer. The cards are marked C1 (Dahlfeld), E1 (Hale), J1 (Wells), B3 (Wells), C8 (Javal), and E10 Dr. Max Poser. Each card measures 3 in x 6 7/8 in.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
